name: Elves
startIntroPart1: Mae g'ovannen, first born Claralanthalasa, leader of the awakened Elves! Your peoples lineage long laid dormant, with mana returning to the world your people have awoken and returned to the ancestral forests. Many of those have been hewn for firewood and the fleets of human nations.
startIntroPart2: Great Claralanthalasa, do you hear the complaints of the land? Can you bring back life to the forests? Will you prevail against the destructive humans?
declaringWar: You are a plague upon Mother Earth! Prepare for battle!
attacked: You evil creature! The forests will grow strong on your blood and bones!
defeated: You have defeated us... but our spirits return to Mother Earth! We shall return!
introduction: Greetings, stranger. I am Claralanthalasa, first born of the Elves. Treat Mother Earth with care and we can be friends.
tradeRequest: Let us trade the riches willingly given by Mother Earth.
uniques: All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
